cons: It is not recommended in pregnancy and lactation phase.
description: Star anise is a well-known digestive aid and used to relieve cramps, indigestion, gas bloating and indigestion.
It is enriched with anti-oxidant vitamins such as vitamin- A and vitamin-C.

Star anise as an antibacterial agent has also been tested by many researchers and its oil has been found to be effective in declining cough due to asthma and bronchitis due to its expectorant property.
Star anise tea is one of the excellent natural remedy to ease a cough and soothe your sore throat.
